name: Todd Addison
text: Did not correct my issue and was very stubborn about listening to what I was saying about it.  After his first surgery I still had same pain in my left hand.  I explained that I felt it was Golf related. I felt I had a broken hamate bone.. he was adamant about blowing me off.  After being released from him, I went to Andrew’s Orthopedic and they confirmed exactly what I thought.  My “Hook of the Hamate” was fractured. Now I’m having surgery to fix what was my issue. What a complete waste of my time he was!

name: Aaron Southern
text: I was referred to Dr. Bonatz for carpal tunnel syndrome. His staff was fantastic. They were able to get me an appointment right away. Dr. Bonatz took his time to make sure every question I had was answered. Their surgery coordinator was able to work me into their surgery schedule within the following week. After the surgery, I was back to work within 3 days, typing on a keyboard all day. If I could give more than 5 stars, I would. I am currently scheduling my surgery with my other hand. Definitely check them out!

resp.text: Wow, we appreciate the high praise, Aaron! We're thankful you chose us to be a part of your recovery journey, and we'll be sure to pass along your kind words to everyone involved.

name: Jason Hall
text: I was referred to Dr. Bonatz by my orthopedic surgeon. She had told me that he was one of the best hand surgeons around. I will say that received great care and the surgery went well. Very pleased with the overall experience. He is the best.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Mr. Hall! We're thrilled that you had a great experience with our clinic.

name: Jared Dailey
text: Dr. Bonantz is rude, does not listen, and does not deal with the correct problems.  I went to him with a hand problem and he informed me I am an overweight diabetic,  which I already knew.  He sent his nurse in with papers for bariatric surgery across the hall.  I have a cyst in my hand I need removed.   I'm well aware of my weight problems.   I have to buy my clothes.  No thank you, you rude, self righteous know it all.  He also told me I would die without the covid vaccine,  and he's told multiple other people this.  I would not recommend this "doctor" to anyone. for anytbing

resp.text: Thank you for bringing this issue to our attention, Jared. We at Southlake Orthopaedics hold ourselves to the highest possible standards of patient care, so we are terribly sorry to hear about this experience. Please reach out to me at (205) 985-4111 or email me at mjones@slortho.com so we can better understand the problem and better serve our patients in the future.

name: Kimberli Calma
text: Dr. Bonatz and his staff are amazing! He is brilliant and he has surrounded himself with an amazing knowledgeable and caring team.  Their attentiveness and follow up is amazing and this comes from a patient with an emergency on a Friday that continued over the weekend into the following week.  They did not miss a beat ensuring I have a healthy full functioning hand.  Thank you Thank you!

name: candy j
text: Dr. Bonatz has to be one of the worst doctors I’ve ever seen. My first visit with him was Nov 6 fracture ring finger sprained middle finger. He had me to start Occupational Therapy immediately. My return visit with Dec 8. My range of motion had improved however the strengthening had not even begun. All of my OT were saying the same thing my hand needed further OT because of my job. On Dec 8 2020 Dr. Bonazt entered the room and began talking with the door of the room wide open. I asked if he could close the door while we discussed my injury. His response no because of COVID-19 a violation of my patients rights mind you Dr. Bonazt was not wearing a mask nor gloves so much for concerns. Also, while waiting on him the door was closed the entire time and anyone else that entered closed the door behind them. He ask me what my job title was twice which I’m sure was on my report. He indicated that the fracture was healing pretty good I didn’t need surgery and therefore there was nothing else he could do. I question him because I must be 100% my strength in my hand indicated that I could hold up to13lbs briefly. I asked him for copies of the report he denied me of that also, stating that workman’s comp would have to request it. Forgetting when I visit him the first time he did.  His sarcastic remarks and tone was very belittling. To add insult to injury as he was walking out he says if you break anything else come see me. Unbelievable and Rude he obviously doesn’t care because there’s no repercussions behind his actions.

name: Kaye Byrd
text: Dr. Bonanza and assistants were pleasant, explained procedures, and answered my questions fully.

name: Jane Carson
text: Office staff was very friendly and helpful . Dr Bonatz was on spot and Office was quick to setup the additional testing to verify my issues so that Dr Bonatz could resolve them. I learned about him from a friend w similar probs and she had excellent results. From everything so far,  I’m sure I will have the same excellent results.

name: Marilyn Seier
text: Excellent surgeon and has operated on both wrists and more recently my right hand. He thoroughly explains the diagnosis and the course of action to repair the problem. In case of an emergency like with my hand he saw me right away and planned surgery two days later. My Southlake physical therapist, Cathy, helped me rehab after all 3 surgeries and she is fantastic

name: Bobby Smith
text: Friendly, helpful,great staff, treat you like family.

name: Crystal Watford
text: Dr. Bonatz is professional, personable, and also quick, which I appreciate. He makes sure I understand what he has explained before leaving the room. He's done one surgery on my hand and is about to do another. I have no hesitations.

name: Ruth Black
text: He’s a sadistic man. Don’t go to him!  He hurts you & he allows you to be in excruciating pain after surgery. There are GREAT hand surgeons in Birmingham who have MANNERS and do not enjoy seeing their patients in pain.  One is Dr. Smith. He’s in the same office.

name: Beverly Kirkpatrick
text: Everyone was very friendly & professional. Dr. Bonatz was very thorough & explained everything concerning treatment for my problem. I would definitely recommend to others.

name: Candis Threatt
text: Dr. Bonatz is so straightforward but also very thorough. My son had a broken thumb that most times would require surgery, Dr. Bonatz simply had my son put in a cast and said, "Three weeks!" In exactly three weeks his thumb healed properly and he's back doing what he loves... Playing BASKETBALL! The supporting staff(front desk, nurses, pct, etc) were phenomenal!

name: Staci Rowell
text: Dr Bonatz is brilliant!  He is precise, professional and courteous. Would definitely recommend him to anyone needing hand/wrist treatment.

name: Madelyn Bauman
text: Very pleased with my association with this clinic and Dr. Bonatz. Every staff member I encountered was friendly and helpful, especially the front desk. Dr. Bonatz is warm, kind and careful, double checking the info received from xrays, etc. Should you be in need of this type medical assistance, I highly recommend this clinic.

name: Efagan53
text: In and out quick, all questions answered in a professional manner

name: William Green
text: The doctor has a sense of humor and a strong personality. He has a plethora of knowledge. I like that. I’d trust him with my children any time!

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback.  Our goal at Southlake Orthopaedics is to provide excellent patient care.

name: Jim Cook
text: I don't have the knowledge to evaluate my visit based on the medical expertise of the people I saw, but I can talk about the efficiency of the office personnel, the personal respect from everyone I saw (both for patients and for each other), and the overall positive atmosphere there. Top notch. Dr. Bonatz took a lot of time to examine my inury, and he followed up by taking me out of the examination room to show me details of my x-rays and diagrams of the injury. That was something I liked very much.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback.  Our goal is to provide excellent service to all our patients.

name: Laine Poole
text: Absolutely the best possible care for any medical problems related to the hand and wrist.

resp.text: Thank you for the the review.

name: m mills
text:
First I can not say enough good things about the staff, they were extremely nice and compassionate. But Dr Ekkhard Bonatz is not, he has zero ethics. He told me he would preform surgery on my broken wrist but and I quote "it would not work anyway", DO NOT LET THIS MAN TREAT YOU!
I ask if I could see my break on an x-ray and he brought in a plastic arm, he patted my arm and thanked me because he could pay off his daughters college tuition with my injury. He acted like a pediatrician talking to a child. He refused pain treatment and said he would drink if it were him, again DO NOT LET THIS MAN TREAT YOU!

name: Dale Dixon
text: I was very nervous at first, in past others gave me no hope. Dr.Bonatz gave me the hope I have been looking for. Very kind and attentive. I feel 100% positive now. All staff made it a pleasurable visit. Thank you Dr.Bonatz

name: Catherine “Best Friend” Marie
text: I would not send my worst enemy to this man. He lied about the procedure,  he lied about the treatment and was upset and told us that if we were to seek a second opinion he would no longer treat. He gave wrong meds when he had pathology report right in front of him . Not a compassionate person and neither is his assistant. Would NOT recommend.

name: Bo Canning
text:
Dr. Bonatz and staff are the most knowledgeable, caring team in Alabama. Dr. Bonatz took the time to answer all my questions during the process of rebuilding my hand. I never felt rushed by him.
His staff were the same way, taking time to discuss the questions you forgot to ask Dr. Bonatz. They are very knowledgeable and very caring.
His P.T. staff are the  and same way, they know their stuff, and are always encouraging you to do your exercises at home.  If you do what they say, you will improve your hand. (They are the best)
Lastly, the front desk and waiting room, in a word, excellent.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback.  Our goal is to provide excellent patient care!

name: Chris Davis
text: Hands down one of the best doctors visits ever! Dr. Bonatz put me at ease with his knowledge, straight forward approached with a great dose of humor. His staff was friendly, quick and efficient and I feel like I received the best healthcare. I highly recommend Dr. Bonatz at Southlake Orthopedics

name: Kimberly Snelling
text: Dr Bonatz is least compassionate Dr I have ever had the misfortune to meet! He has no ethics whatsoever. He told my husband he would do surgery on his hand but it probably wouldn't work. He mentioned he needed the money for his daughter s college. He also said he would do the second surgery, he mentioned he wanted to go Spain. He also thanked my husband for fracturing his wrist. If you have hurt yourself and need treatment I wouldn't not recommend Dr. Bonatz. I would not take my dog to him. The staff however were very helpful and compassionate.

resp.text: At Southlake Orthopaedics we certainly sympathize with our patients and the pain they have due to injuries or other conditions.  Very sorry you found your recent visit to be unsatisfactory to the standard you expected.  We are happy to coordinate a second opinion with one of our other Board Certified physicians if you so choose.  Our goal is to improve any conditions we can.

name: DEBRA SMITH
text: Dr. Bonatz and staff gave me excellent care before and after surgery. I couldn't have ask for better treatment.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback!

name: Juandelisha Perry
text: I am so greatful to have met Dr. Bonatz and the staff of Southland  orthopedic. For over 10+ years of  chronic pain I spent years searching for help and  consulting with my primay physican, rheumatologist,  neurologist, osteoarthritis, pain management, and any other specialist.   Unfortunately, they all gave up on me and past me on to the next specialist. Finally, I was referred to, I was Dr. Bonatz.  The frist cosultation, he knew what was wrong, schedule some tests and did not give up on me until he solved the problem.  For the first time in years, I can sleep at night with out pain, go outside during the winter with out pain. Thank you so much!!!

name: C Miller
text: I am due to have surgery with Dr. Bonatz  in the next couple of weeks. So I cannot speak of that experience yet. I can however speak of his Staff which has been wonderful, and informative, as has Dr. Bonatz. I would have given 5 stars except for the fact both times I have been to see him, once at Grandview, the other at the Southlake office, both times I had to wait 20 to 30 minutes past my appointment time. I realize they get busy, however  my time is important as well   My suggestion would be to find a way to improve upon that.  It’s a shame to have an appointment time of 1:15pm and not leave until 3:00.

name: Kassie Luster
text: We had a really good experience with Dr Bonatz. We were very pleased with the care we recieved. My 10 yr old broke her pinky finger and it went into her growth plate. He was very good with her and making the right decision for her care. She was in a custom splint made for just her size for 3 weeks. We went back and he was so nice. Said she was healing nicely. She really liked him alot and would recommend anyone else with smaller children to see him. Staff was really awesome as well. We had not longer than a five min wait time each time we went.

name: Ronald Barksdale
text: Awesome

resp.text: Thanks for the review.

name: Amy Harvel
text: The staff was Excellent! Very kind and caring. Dr. Sterling is amazing. They are all such a blessing 💞 Thank you!

name: A R
text: Everyone (and I mean everyone) was so kind and friendly both times that I’ve been there. Thank you, Dana RN, Brandi RN, Mike (tech), Amelia RN, Brenna (tech), Jimmy (CRNA), and Stephanie RN. Yes! I got their names because this was an awesome experience. Surgery is never fun, but it helps to have genuinely caring people. Madison Surgery Center rocks!!!

name: Brooke G
text: I had a very, very good experience here. I have had some serious health issues the last few years, and they took a lot of time with me. Everyone was beyond nice! I get very anxious with medical things now (even with something minor like the upper endoscopy I had here), but they made sure to make me feel as comfortable as possible. I highly recommend!

name: Angi Gregg
text: Lack of communication and compassion.

name: Donavan Marcy
text: Front desk is very helpful and so are the doctors, but the lady who is in charge of the whole place is very rude and disrespectful.

name: Tiffany Geahr
text: My five year old daughter was so scared about getting pins put in her elbow. Every nurse we came in contact with was so nice and made her feel so much better about everything. They got us back on time and had us out before we knew it. Thank you guys so much! Highly recommend!

name: ERICA GULLEY
text: So glad we were able to move my daughters surgery to Huntsville Hospital. This place is unorganized. They called the DAY BEFORE her surgery was scheduled to do a COVID survey. This caused her surgery to be postponed. I have told them TWICE they are texting the wrong number with updates and yet they continue to text that number. NEVER again will we use this center!!!!!

name: Karan
text: A friend came in for a colonoscopy. The paperwork said to come in at 8 am and the procedure was at 9am. We arrived before 8 he checked in and he was given an id about 8:20 and the nurse informed him he arrived early. We didn’t think anything of that statement until he was called back again before 9am. She told him his appointment was at 10am and he was suppose to be there at 9am. He told her no that’s not what my paperwork says and she sent him back to the waiting room. Long story short we watched people come and go after we arrived.  I complained and he complained and we showed them the paperwork with the highlighted arrival and procedure times. Again go sit down and we will call you. They called him to the back we’re both thinking for surgery shortly after 9am. I was called to the back thinking he was done at 10:30 and they still hadn’t done the surgery.  I was told around 10:45 to go back up front it was 11:50 when they called me to the back again. At this point only 2 of us were In the waiting room. I know things happen but not once did anyone apologize or even acknowledge they had made a mistake. We had the paperwork with the time to arrive and the time of the surgery. If you make a mistake you fix it I feel like because we complained they put people ahead of us. How could we get there before 8am and only me and one other person be left in the waiting room. It was 12:30 before we were able to leave. It was a stressful experience but to be ignored and they not fix the problem or even apologize is unprofessional and we will not be going back there again.

name: SC SC
text:
Honestly, everyone there was super friendly and kind.  I have no complaints on that end.  The facility is clean.  Everything goes fast and smooth.

My complaint is that they don't care about your privacy.   I had forms released to my driver with private information on them that my driver wasn't to see.  I had asked multiple times that my other conditions and medications, since they can figure out the condition with the name of the medications, not be mentioned or discussed in front of my driver.  I was assured that it would not be.

Low and behold as I am waking up and getting ready to leave, my driver has my release paperwork which has a print out of my medications on a single page.  When I got in the car my driver gave me the paperwork and that's when I realized it had been given out without my permission.

On my second procedure I never mentioned it.  After all, it was too late, and no forms such as the previous ones were given to us making me question if it was done intentionally the first time.

While they're nice folks I wouldn't recommend them.  What other information do they give out?  I thought with all the privacy issues I would've been respected as a patient and my private information not be unnecessarily shared with people who didn't have the right to know.

name: Matthew Urbanic
text:
I've been accustomed to having to wait for a VERY long time when a loved one is up for surgery. This being my own go at it, I expected the same. I was wrong.

I have never seen the process go so smoothly and professionally. From walking in the door to being on the gurney took under ten minutes. Lindsey, the nurse who did the IV stick did it so well that I didn't even know it happened. After that, it was frankly a blur. I woke up from surgery, got dressed and was out in five minutes. My surgeon clearly had the resources and preparation to focus on the job at hand, because that place runs so well.

Fantastic performance, overall.

name: Lisa Downs
text: I have been a patient here a total of 4 times and each time my expectations are more than met.   The facility is clean, the staff is professional, and I have never had to wait more than I expected to for my procedures.   I highly recommend Madison Surgery Center to any of my friends and family who need any type of outpatient procedure done.    They can perform many different types of procedures at this facility from endoscopes to general and orthopedic surgeries.    If your doctor doesn't mention it when scheduling your procedure... ask to be done at Madison Surgery Center!!!  You won't regret it!!!

name: Abby Persinger
text: My son had a surgery there, and they was so amazing. And helped out so much with him. They are wonderful with Autistic children. My daughter is have surgery done tomorrow! I think they are so nice, and also on top of everything as well.

name: Dallas Phillips
text: The nurses are the best you will find in this climate. They make sure you are taken care of with a sincere concern for your comfort in a place where modestly is at a premium. Thanks to all as well as Dr.Bradley Rice.

name: Erica Mihelin
text: My boyfriend had been throwing up constantly for over a month. He needed an endoscopy to figure out what was wrong. He’d lost 20 pounds by the time he was supposed to get the test done. When we arrived, they turned him away for not having $550 to pay for it. Clearly, they care more about money than the well-being of their patients. It’s disappointing. We will do no further business with them.

name: Scott Certain
text:
My daughter had to have pins put in her arm because she broke it.  I have BC/BS insurance and even though I didn't authorize the use of out of network providers Madison Surgery Center let two (2)Nurse Practitioners of whom I never met claim on my insurance.  Be careful because you are about to get slammed.

Update.  I contacted Madison Surgery Center and they informed me that They only provide the facility to perform the procedure.  I have since rectified the situation with my "Advocate in General" Blue Cross/ Blue Shield who negotiated with The Orthopedic Center in Huntsville to re-submit the claims under "In-Network".

name: Terry Moore Mowery
text: I had an endoscope done here recently and the entire staff from the receptionist to everyone involved in the procedure made me feel comfortable and at ease. I plan on going there again if I need a procedure done.

name: ricky Fitzpatrick
text: CLEAN, SUPER CLEAN PLACE, GREAT EMPLOYEES< & DOCTORS,     #!   ALL THE WAY.

name: Savannah A
text: I had a colonoscopy/endoscopy scheduled for 8am last Thursday at the Madison Surgery Center﻿.  Before I started the awful prep solution (I had already gone all day without eating anything but green Jell-O) I wanted to make sure we were still going to have the procedures with the expected snow, and since my doctors office was closed Wednesday all day, I messaged my doctor on here.  She said that I should have gotten a call from Madison Surgery Center (which I never did) but that they would open at 9am the following morning.  So Daddy and I got up and left his house (in Hazel Green) at 7am Thursday, drove 20mph, sliding around everywhere and finally made it about 8:40am to the Madison Surgery Center only to find that NO ONE was there.  We waited until 9:15am or so before we finally headed back home, sliding and driving 20mph.  Madison Surgery Center had decided to close and apparently had text my doctor at 3am in the morning Thursday and let her know they were going to close.  They never called me at all.  Thankfully, my mom was ticked off and called until she could get me in at Crestwood (so I wouldn't have to go through drinking the prep stuff and not eating again the next week in order to have the procedures done.)  My doctor was so nice and got a babysitter for her son and came in and still did my procedure at Crestwood the same day!  Dr. Roath was really great and so was Crestwood and all the nurses who took care of me there.  She was very sorry for the mix up and said that Madison Surgery Center should have called me.  Very aggravating that Madison Surgery Center made no effort to let me know that they were closing and my Dad and I basically risked our lives driving to Madison in the ice and snow, with me dehydrated and starving from not eating or drinking all day, only to have to turn right back around and drive back in it.  Very disapointed in Madison Surgery Center and how they handled the situation and their lack of respect for their patients!

name: Connie Atchley
text:
I had a colonscopy scheduled.I wanted to make sure that we were still going to have the procedure because of anticipated bad weather.  My doctor's office was closed but I was able to speak to my doctor via facebook.  She said that I would receive a call from MSC (which I never did) if anything changed but that they would have a delayed opening the following morning. I got up and checked their website which still said they would open at 9 am.  So me and my driver got up and left very early because I was also told that if MSC opened and we didn't come that there would be a $75 cancellation fee.  We made it there only to find that NO ONE was there.    MSC had decided to close without no notification to me at all.  Now this is bad enough for any procedure but can you imagine having to take that awful prep solution again (than cost me $32 the first time)?  Very upset.   We later found out that there were other patients that they didn't call.  Several pulled up that morning for procedures but left when no one was there.   Very aggravating that MSC didn't call to let me know that they were closing while we basically risked our lives trying to get there.  So disappointed in MSC and how they handled the situation and their lack of respect for their patients.

The next day when MSC opened, I called them and spoke to the office manager because I felt like I was owed an explanation. I was very nice and only asked what happened.  She basically told me that they had tried to call and  had a wrong number.  They didn't call any of my doctor's other appointments that were scheduled for that day.  Guess they had wrong numbers for them too.  In fact, they said that they were working off of an incomplete patient listing.  She also went on to say that they had two employees show up which I quickly disputed because I got out of the car and knocked on the door and it was dark and no one was there. She backed off of the claim at that point.  I didn't receive any kind of apology from her, which I still feel like I am owed.  I know that sometimes things happen like bad weather which is out of our control but with this age of technology at least the website could have been updated.    The website still said that MSC would open at 9 am the following morning when I was up taking the last of my prep.  I feel like this was very unprofessional,  I would avoid using MSC.  There seems to be no sympathy at all there towards their patients or at least none towards me when I called.  I am still in shock over how things were handled.

name: Charmane Garland
text: Got beat up during surgery!!! Pictures to prove and turned them into the state. Worst ever!!!

name: Nikki Brown
text: Terrible experience with business office!

name: darlene watkins
text: Like

name: Amanda Weaver
text: Love this place the staff is always very friendly been going there for years and have never had any issues with them

name: Tammy May
text: I got my exam done when I went to pickup my glasses I couldn’t see good at all... went back they did another exam found out the Dr prescribed the wrong prescription, also changed from pergresive lenses to single and they refused to refund me the difference in the price of pergresive to single lenses!!! He made a mistake I downgrade to single vision so I don’t get a refund for the difference because I chose a different lense after not being able to see with the pergresive and because he gave the wrong prescription!!! Wow!!! I’ll never go back to them ever again!! I wouldn’t refer them to anyone!!!

resp.text: Tammy, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about your experience in our office! This is definitely not what we want for you. I'd like to look more deeply into what happened. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Brannon Butler
text: I have seen Dr. Potter for a long time and your eye care couldn't be in better hands.

name: Mary Hartman
text:
Everyone very professional and efficient..knowledgable about their specific job responsibilities.
Attentive to covid issues.

name: Dannie Cutts
text: Always professional!  My wife and I have used Dr. Potter for years.

name: SANDRA Lacy
text: Dr. Potter is awesome. Love the girls up front they take care of me.  My whole family uses Dr. Potter .  Love my new contacts.

name: Lauren Smith
text: Potter Eye Care goes above and beyond for every patient!! Dr. Potter is an awesome doctor and the staff is very professional!!! If you need your eyes checked I recommend Dr. Potter!!

name: B Wil
text: Dr Potter is great!! He spends time with each patient. However, Make sure to watch what they charge you. EVERY time i got to the front desk they "messed up" my bill. If i didn't catch it they would over charge me every time.

name: Joseph Gilbert
text: Good place.  They hooked me up.  They gave me free sample contacts until my insurance would pay for a 6 month supply.  Doctor is competent and fast.

name: Tanathia Mitchell
text: I was a new patient looking for a new place to german an eye exam and new glasses and i absolutely loved everything about it. Dr. Aleen was awesome; she explained everything to me that was going on and explained everything so i could understand air my vision. The staff was absolutely amazing and very helpful in helping me pick out my new glasses! Will most definitely recommend this place!

name: Lawrence Carroll
text: I greatly appreciate the friendly staff. They are competent professionals in whom I have complete trust.

name: Helena Roldan
text: Dr Murray Glussman and staff are absoutely the best!

name: Cathy
text: Super friendly staff. Everyone was friendly and professional and made my appointment a pleasant experience!

name: Karen Duncan
text: Dr. Glusman is a wonderful doctor. He is caring, patient, experienced, and funny. Love him. ❤️

name: Cassie Wallace
text: My tech was absolutely fantastic. Really appreciated her candor. The rest of the team was top notch as well!

name: Love Angel94
text: Dr. Aleen Kaltakdjian is young and very knowledgeable. This was my husband and  I's fist visit with her on 12/16/20. We were very impressed with her and will be making her our new eye Dr.

name: Jennifer McGinnis
text: Had a wonderful experience COVID style last week. Everyone was very friendly (which is rare lately!) Clean, organized, and Dr. Glusman was wonderful. My glasses experience was great too.

name: James Davis
text: Have been seeing Dr. Glusman for many years now and it’s always a pleasure. He and his staff always make you feel welcome and his treatment always great.

name: Martella Owes
text: The entire doctor's office visit was exceptional as always . Dr GLUSMAN is a doctor that genuinely cares about his patients and the staff as well !!!

name: Kerry Williams
text: Dr. Glusman and his staff is nothing but true professionals. I would recommend his expertise to anyone.

name: Eric Weber
text: Friendly staff. Answered all my questions and pricing seemed competitive. Very well operated.

name: Vernetta Henson
text: Have been with them since 2000.  Very well pleased.

name: David Webber
text: I enjoy my examinations with Dr. Glusman.  Very professional and very honest.

name: Paul Jackson
text: The staff was friendly and Dr. Elkins was personable and knowledgeable.  However, they added a lot of extra things to the lenses that ran the price way up.  When I got the glasses, they had the prescription wrong.  I took them back and they were going to redo them.  I told them how the close up prescription needed to be adjusted but they said it would be too much and ordered them like they wanted.  I called when I hadn't heard in a couple weeks and they had forgotten to send them off.    When they came in, it was just the lenses and no frames.  They didn't have the frames in stock so they would have to order them.  I live two hours from the office and didn't want to make yet another trip so they said they would mail them to me.  When I got them today, they should have listened to me as the focal point is still too close.  I've had five interactions with them and have been dissatisfied with all five.  They are very nice, but can't seem to get things done right.

resp.text: Paul, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear we haven't been able to get your glasses right for you yet! It's so frustrating when you've tried to communicate what you need and it hasn't been heard. I've passed your concerns on to our management team and they would like to reach out to you -- when you have a moment, could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com? Again, I'm so sorry to hear about dropping the ball for you. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Brenda Massey
text:
I went to this Dr.   About 2 years ago. My glasses were like 500.00 with insurance. I thought that was way to much. Well went back for ck up. 2 years later. I was told I had
Over paid last time by 150.00 . So  I ordered more glasses.  Well I changed my mind. And told them to cancel the order. Mind u it was like 30 min. Later. They told me the could not refund my money for 2 weeks. Well 2 weeks later I got the 150.00 they owned me FOR 2 YEARS WITH OUT INTEREST.  and its been about 6 weeks and still the 170.00 has not ben sent to me. DON'T GO TO THESES PEOPLE THEY WILL TAKE YOU MONEY. AND NOT GIVE IT BACK.  I'VE CALLED THEM EVERY 2 WEEKS AND STILL NO MONEY. I'VE NEVER HAD A DR. KEEP OVER PAYMENT.  FOR 2 YEARS. IF I OVER PAY. THE DR. WILL SEND IT AT THE END OF THE YEAR. WHEN THEY COLSE THE BOOKS FOR THE YEAR. SO U CAN'T TRUST THESE PEOPLE.  THE LADY CONTACTED ME AND TOLD ME THE HAD MONEY AND THEY WOULD SEND IT BACK WHEN THEY GOT AROUND TO IT .WOULD DON'T GIVE A DATE. ... SHE WAS VERY RUDE I TOLD HER I WOULD PUT IT ON THE POST IT . SHE SAID WE DON'T CARE.  DON'T GIVE THEM YOUR MONEY......

resp.text: Hi Brenda, my name is Katie. I am so sorry to hear about your experience at our office. I would like to forward this to management so it doesn't happen again. When you have a moment - please email me at kaitlyngibson@eyecare-partners.com. Again, I apologize and I look forward to hearing from you.

text: The staff was welcoming, friendly and efficient. Dr. Glusman is highly skilled with an excellent “bedside manner.”

text: My visit with EyeCare Associates was very good . First Class services.

text: All are amazing, caring, talented professionals! Plainly the best, period!

name: brian doyle
text: My recent purchase of two reading glasses and one pair of sunglasses was a surprising and most pleasant experience.  Ashley compared the two current promotions to find me the very best price.  Then, several days later, I received a call that my glasses had arrived, but Eyecare Associates had rejected them after inspection and had ordered a new fabrication.  Wow!  Just a few days after that, I went to pick up my new remakes.  I was not satisfied with the field of vision they offered, and Ashley showed me the three types of lenses available.   I selected a set with a broader field of vision and, in spite of the $80 increase each of the three sets would entail, placed my order.  The next day, Ashley called to tell me she had discussed my case with the manager, and they had decided to wave all further fees, so these three new pairs would be free!   Double-wow!   I was impressed and, frankly, touched by the empathy, attention, personal concern, and expert service I received from Eyecare Associates.    EA went out of their way and beyond all my expectations to insure a fair and positive experience for me, and I simply cannot recommend them enough!  Definitely be my go-to eye care specialists from now on.

text: I really enjoyed my visit. I felt comfortable and the customer service was amazing. V was very friendly and informative also the Doctor was extremely thorough and took his time examining my eyes. I will definitely recommend EyeCare Associates to friends and Family.

name: Dianne Miller
text:
Due to a series of mistakes, I found myself in Daphne AL with no contacts, eye glasses, and an empty  right eye of the necessary contact.  I have terrible eyesight with my right eye being a -8.50. It is very difficult to find any eye MD who has this contact in stock.  Note this is the Friday before 2018 New Year and have to drive back to ATLANTA GA.  Called my home eye MD, who is part of the EyeCare network. They suggested I try contacting EyeCare Associates in the area.  This recommendation led me here.

Ashley, in Dr. Glusman's office, was so helpful, pleasant, & professional.  They saved my life by having in stock a -8.50 contact!!  If I lived in this area, I would definitely make this EyeCare center my home for all my eye needs.  I am so grateful for their assistance.  Thank you, thank you!

Thanks

name: Graham McGalliard
text:
I’ve been to both Prattville and Sturbridge locations for exams with contacts and glasses in the past. I had LASIK April 22 performed by Dr. Swan and the results have been incredible. I could see drastically better leaving the office 10 minutes after. At my post-op appointment the next day I could see almost 20/15 out of one eye. The other eye does have more irritation and dryness and is improving daily.

Dr. McFaden and the rest of the staff have been very helpful and friendly getting my procedure set up and during recovery to help with the irritation and minor swelling.

I look forward to see how my eyes have healed at the 1 week follow-up. I highly recommend LASIK with Montgomery Eye Physicians. It’s been life-changing already.

text: I had to wait a long tome to see the doctor, over 2 hours.

name: Jenny Griff
text: Took my brother with a disability to office saw Dr. Shin everything started smoothly until he started to examine him. He started yelling to look this way don't blink. I told the doctor he's not deaf and I'm translating no need to yell, well he needs to do want I'm asking. 🤨Really a person with down syndrome can't control the fact that he see's something coming at his eye. He was suppose to take a sample of whatever he had in his eye and the risk was if he moves or blink I could cut his eye. I call our mom and told her the risk and how this doctor acted towards my brother she was not happy nor was I we left but not before I told him that we would find someone that can have the patience and find a different way to do this procedure his response was well the other place you will find a specialist is in Bham and if you don't he will lose his eye. I told him don't worry I have driven to Bham before to take him to doctors and I will make sure he doesn't lose his eye unlike you.

text: Very friendly service and doctors will answer all your questions and give you just about all the information you need,  I especially liked that my doctor gave me sample eye drops to try and that I can get them over the counter or by prescription from my primary care provider.

name: Shemaiah Campbell
text: Most of seemed really nice. But, I came in March 3rd to order a contact lense. Dr. McFaden gave me a contact lense review. One had gotten broken 2 days beforeand. Dr. McFaden said it was ok to go ahead and order my lense now so I can have it on the way soon and if it needed to be changed they will do that on my regular schedule exam on March 13th. I was told by one of the nurses that the order for my contact was put in and there wasn't a payment for today and that they will call me when it came in. Forward to March 13th when it was time to have a regular full exam, I asked about the order, and then that's when I was told I had to make a full payment first before it was ordered. So what they told me the first time was a straight up LIE. My contact could've almost been here by now if they would've just told me that in first place!! Now I have to go with 1 freaking contact in for another 2 weeks because somebody don't know how to properly do their job!! This really pisses me off and Tiffany always have a rude demeanor.  My problem wasn't paying for the contact upfront! I could've done that March 3rd! It's the lie that I was told about the ordering! It's not fun going longer than what I have to with one contact!

name: Karen Harris
text: When I scheduled my new patient appointment almost 2 months ago, I was adamant that I wanted to be seen by an ophthalmologist.  An appointment was made to see Dr. Mitchell and to also see Dr. McFadden for my contact exam.  Fast forward to today, when I arrived for my appointment, I'm informed that it has been cancelled.  No phone call, text, email...NOTHING!  As a matter of fact, I had to call the week before to confirm my appointment  because I had not received any form of confirmation.  Needless to say, I will not return or recommend this practice to anyone.  I did not appreciate having my appointment cancelled without any just reason and then only to arrive and have the lady at the reception desk continuously trying to get me to see another doctor.

resp.text: Karen, we are sorry to hear about your experience today. We are looking into the issue now and will call you shortly to review. Thank you for the feedback.

Your feedback is important to our practice, and we appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your experience.

When I showed up for my new patient appointment I was told the Dr. had left sick. I was told they would call me to reschedule in the morning. No one called.
I called them the next day and then I was put on hold and then hung up on.  It's very clear to me they don't need/want new patients. Moving on

name: Dick Martin
text: I had the occasion to have a glaucoma test by Dr Shin which was with a hand held paortable device. It happened to be 10 points higher than a test administered to me days earlier by Dr . Izer.  He wanted to prescribe medication. When I said I just had the test 4 days ago by another doctor, he got very upset and told me there is no reason for me to come back since I saw the other doctor. Apparently he doesn’t like a patient getting a second opinion. He is insecure or threatened by a second opinion, especially when there is such a disparity in the result.

text: I had a difficult time trying to find this office even with the GPS feature on my cellphone

name: Carrie Blocker
text:
I was disappointed because we’d used them in the past and been satisfied with service. This transaction was not a good one, and we will not be returning.
Upon entering, we were met with grumpiness as if we were inconveniencing the staff. Coming in simply for a lens update, i anticipated an easy interaction. No one directed us and once we finally spoke with someone, she acted as if we should know the policies. We had to schedule an appointment to come back just to have lenses replaced. So i scheduled for their next open slot (almost a week later).
We were met with the same attitude upon our appointment and went through the whole process of ordering. As i was about to pay, we were informed that the glasses would have to be shipped out and so my daughter would not have glasses for the next 2 weeks. Unacceptable. I canceled the order and we left to seek better options elsewhere… which we found with smiles and a lower price tag.

resp.text: Carrie, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about your experience getting glasses in our office -- that's definitely not what we want for you! I'd like to look into why this happened. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

text: The staff at EyeCare Associates is the best. Everyone there is super friendly, helpful, and personable. This is the only place I go for my eyes. Highly recommend.

name: Bob Orrison
text: They have all their COVID protocols worked out, so things progressed very smoothly.  No serious waiting involved.  Dr Harris was kind, courteous and always a pleasant conversationalist.  The texting of reminders prior to the appointment and the follow up afterwards were concise, well timed and with a light-touch.  After 15 years we still remain satisfied customers.  So, go check them out.

name: Heather Clark
text: I have been going to Dr. Harris for so many years.  They are always very clean and so very kind.  They are always ready to assist you in a timely manner.

name: salina coleman
text: Dr. Jackson and his nurse was Awesome!! The whole place was a pleasure to be in the midst of.

name: Emily S
text: Both my husband and I felt like we were just a commissions check to this office. The initial welcome from the receptionist was cold and annoyed. We spent 3 hours apiece here to get contacts (him) and glasses/contacts (me) and walked out spending far more than usual. Being a new patient from out of town I would have expected more of a consultation from the doctor before just throwing me into contacts. I was only able to wear each contact set for 2-3 hours before having to take them out because they were green. When I called the office to express my concern the only thing they said was to use contact solution not tap water. (Who does that anyways?! Tap water?) I’m sorry I’ve worn contacts before and have never had them turn green. So there’s a contact fitting co-pay wasted and not refunded. It’s been a solid 2 weeks since ordering my glasses (should have been 7-10 business days) I called twice to get an update and get transferred to a voicemail with no response (24-48 hours right?). When I went looking for new frames the person helping me knew my insurance budget and pulled frames almost double my budget rather than asking me what I felt comfortable spending. She also picked frames that were extremely outside of my current shape, style,  and comfort zone. All and all I probably will find a different office for us next year simply because the lack of care, communication, and consultation.

resp.text: Emily, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about your experience in our office. It's so frustrating when you don't feel heard! We strive to provide excellent care for every patient, and we obviously fell short for you and your husband. I've spoken to our management team about your concerns and they would like to reach out to you. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm so sorry to hear about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: tom reinhardt
text: You all were extremely helpful especially the sweet women at the front desk as she could tell I was in pain and cared enough to stop what she was doing and get me some numbing eye drops and put them in for me to help sooth the pain it was such a relief and really a blessing knowing that there is still at least one practice that has caring and loving staff or employees that care about their patients and don't treat them as a number on a clip board! And that can mean a lot to a patient like myself! For me I lost my mother when I was 11 And when I came into EyeCare Associates they made me feel right at home like their on son and made me feel like I had two moms behind the front desk. :) Thank y’all for all of your help, care and concern! And I LOOK forward to seeing you all again soon! :)

name: Michelle Spell
text: Thank you Dr. Harris and all the staff for providing a personable and professional environment.

name: jimau95
text: Dr Harris was great.  Took time to answer questions and my concerns.

name: Danielle Duff
text: Sure, my appointment went rather quickly despite a full waiting room. text: I truly appreciate the time and genuine concern Dr. Jackson afforded me. I have tremendous respect for his character and intelligence. He far surpassed my expectations in both areas.I am very grateful to him. All of the staff were very friendly and courteous, as well.

text: Best eye doctor visit ever! Dr. Harris is awesome, very thorough in explaining what's going on with my vision and also opportunities I have. Mandy was awesome! name: Ashlee Pickett
text: My daughter had an appointment scheduled for mid December which was made the previous December. When I got a reminder I realized her annual appointment was during her exams at school, which she obviously cannot miss. When I asked Jennifer about rescheduling and She said the next appointment is not until March I explained to her my daughter already could not see well because her vision had changed so much since her last appointment, but she was unable to help me. I am not upset to be changing doctor offices because the staff here is either too busy or has bad customer service. I have called several times in the past and no one would ever call me back on more than one issue. I think the doctors are good, but the support staff needs some coaching for sure.

resp.text: Hi Ashlee, my name is Katie. I am so sorry to hear about your experience with us! I would like to forward this to management. When you have a moment, please email me at kaitlyngibson@eyecare-partners.com. Again, I apologize and I look forward to hearing from you.

text:
I'm sorry I got "lost" over the years due to moving, retiring and pop up eyecare places.
I will never do that again! I need to stay in touch with my"Good Doctor!" Dr. Jackson
See you all next year if nothing happens before then! 😘🥰😍

name: Cody H
text: Dr Harris was great! He was patient despite it being a very busy day and I really felt appreciated. I will definitely visit again for eye exams and I have already recommended him to my family.

name: Berniece Pierce
text:
I had my appointment on Wednesday, 10 July 2013. I normally see either Dr. Harris or Dr. Jackson. On this visit I was seen by Doctor Fredrick Jackson and it was a truly amazing experience. Everyone was extremely courteous and friendly. I was really impressed with Dr. Jackson on this occasion. He took his time explaining everything he was doing and why he was doing it. His explanations and genuine concern went a long way in putting my fears to rest. He not only took an interest in my eye health, but he was also very forthcoming with sharing some possible solutions to other areas of my overall health that could potentially affect my eye health. He offered some possible solutions to help with bouts of vertigo I have been experiencing for a couple of years now. He suggested some things that I could try to help to minimize the severity of the migraine headaches that I have been suffering for more than thirty years. No one else had ever made the suggestions to me that he did. I can't wait to put them into practice to see if they will help even the tiniest little bit. Thanks, Dr. Jackson, for one of the most enjoyable appointments I have ever had. And trust me, I will make sure that you are highly recommended to everyone that I know who needs a good optometrist. Keep up the good work.

Had my yearly exam on February 4, 2015 and must say that it was a very interesting experience. Even though the wait time was a few minutes past my appointment time, I clearly understand why. The doctors spend as much time as needed with each patient and I realize that I will get the same type of treatment when it is my turn. Also, Dr. Harris' staff are extremely kind, considerate, and compassionate. I just love Dr. Harris to death (no offense Dr. Jackson, I love you, too). Even though he informed me that I have cataracts, he took the time to explain all of my options and shared his experiences with his father's surgery. I left the office feeling very good and felt that Dr. Harris had provided me with all the information that I needed to make a decision. Once I made the decision, he even scheduled an appointment for me--talk about the personal touch approach. I would highly recommend Primary Eyecare Associates to anyone. As a matter of fact, my entire family uses Primary Eyecare Associates. So, if you are looking for a good eye care center and optometrist, give them a call, THEY ARE THE BEST I have ever used. KEEP DOING WHAT YOU ARE DOING.

name: Lenny Samford
text: Have been using them for years. Very professional and courteous staff. Dr. Jackson is always very patient and thorough. He takes time to explain everything to you. I highly recommend them.

name: DDB Pollard
text: Dr. Tim Harris is the best! The staff are all friendly and professional! I always leave feeling confident that I received the absolute best in vision care!!

name: Angela E
text: The office staff is very polite, friendly, and professional. Dr. Jackson is awesome.  He took care of all my eye care issues. He answered all my questions. His smile brighten  the room when he greet you during the office visit. I would to thank the Eye Care Associate staff for taking care of all my family's eye care needs whether routine or emergency care.

text: Mandy brought me back to begin my exam and was exceptional-- Great personality and made my visit seem like not a Dr visit at all. I was nervous about having my eyes dilated but Mandy mentioned a new technology that takes a "picture/xray" instead of dilation. It's a $39 cost but I knew that was worth it!!   I really liked Dr Harris, too. He was friendly and knowledgeable. He tweaked my contact prescription and I'm seeing much better now!  I will definitely recommend your office.  Kudos to all the friendly staff.

text: I've been coming here for nearly 20 years and have never had a bad experience. I've seen both Dr, Jackson and Dr. Harris and am equally comfortable with both. If you're looking for knowledgeable, caring doctors with a friendly team surrounding them, this is the place for you! I HIGHLY recommend them! =D

name: SHEILAH TIBBS
text:
I have been a patient for over 20 years with Primary Eye Care.  Dr. Jackson and Dr. Harris as well as all the doctors are very educated in their field.  For years I suffered with Dry Eye and with the help of Dr. Jackson and the patient care I am given this issue has been greatly resolved. I also had Lasik Surgery around 10 years ago with excellent results.  And today I am still seeing 20/20, I have had no regression in my vision.

Dr. Jackson is a very caring doctor, he not only cares about your vision he cares about your overall health.  Your health and medications are very important part of his exam.

Dr. Harris is very caring as well concerning you overall health.  He has a free spirit and your vision and how well you see is extremely important.

I would not go anywhere else for mine or my family's eye care.
When I leave I know they as well as myself have been give the utmost care as possible. And an exam that surpasses all others.

I thank them greatly for their compassion and care I am given.

I also work for these doctors and I personally know and see first hand the care that our patients are given.  Your optical needs are as important as your eye exam.  If its not right they will do everything possible to make things right and see you are satisfied. Your Vision is their main Focus.

text: I've never had to feel nervous about the meds that dilate your eyes. The tech makes you feel like you are special and he/she displays professionalism. At the check-out desk, you are given the glasses purposed for dilation of the eyes. I really enjoyed my experience at Eye Care Associates.

text: I have been going here at least 10 years for my eye care needs. The staff is always super sweet and nice. Today is the first time I had a bad experience. The Dr. that I had always seen was gone so I was seen by a Dr. Jackson. For the most part he was professional. Until I inquired about Lasik eye surgery. I'm 24 and was told I was a good candidate for the program but I am under the age requirement. But more importantly I was offended when he said and I'm paraphrasing "People your age usually can't afford it. And if so it's BC their grandparents pay for it". I was offended and felt that comment was unprofessional and uncalled for.

text: I've been going to Dr. Harris for over 20 years, since their office was on Atlanta Highway. Then they moved to Carmichael, which was fine. Then they moved way out past Thorington Road, which is a pain, but I still go there. I've always been happy with the service in their office. A couple of years ago it seems they were bought out by some company that requires them to over schedule people and causes some very long waits. My last two appointments have run nearly an hour late. But the doctors and staff are still very nice and we get good quality glasses there.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review -- we're so glad you enjoyed your experience!

name: Beverly Jones
text: I had a consult with Dr. Pearce for a breast augmentation and possible full Mommy makeover and immediately knew I was in the right place for me! From the moment I walked in the door I felt such a calm and welcoming atmosphere. The entire staff made sure to make me feel welcomed, valued, and comfortable from the time I entered the waiting room until leaving their office. Dr.Pearce was so personable, super informative, down to earth and most importantly made me feel comfortable and at ease the entire visit. I never once felt pressured or like just another person to him. He made sure that I knew he was there for me and answered any and all questions that I had and made me feel like I was his only patient that day! I would recommend this office and their entire staff 100 times over!

name: Renee S.
text: I am one to read reviews but never write them.   I really felt today I should take the time to mention how wonderful Dr. Pearce and his staff are.   Dr. Pearce listens to your concerns and then offers great suggestions.   The entire staff makes sure everything is perfect as far as medical history, medications needed, and appointments times confirmed.   Very happy with results.   I would highly recommend Dr. Pearce!!!!

name: Bonnie Bartelt
text: Dr. Clinton is not only a great and experienced Plastic Surgeon, he is very knowledgeable, compassionate, honest, patient and a great listener. He is very honest about expectations and makes sure he understands your motivation for the procedure. He suggests procedures that will provide results his patients want.  Dr. Clinton is patient with consultations and gives the patient as much information as possible. He encourages questions and concerns. His office is beautiful, clean and safe. The staff are very welcoming, personable, well trained and accessible.

text: I had a lovely experience at Reveal Beauty. I was immediately and kindly greeted at the entrance and promptly brought to my consultation room. My nurse, Amanda was so professional and patient with me. She noted importantly things in writing and was patient in answering all of my questions. Dr. Pearce then met with me and further answered questions. He made me feel so comfortable and I never felt rushed. He is extremely knowledgeable and dedicated to the best result for me! I’m so pleased with this practice.

text: I couldn’t ask for a better experience than I had here!!  From the first phone call to the surgery itself everyone was Great!!  Dr. Pearce did a wonderful job with my surgery.  He was very caring and personable!!  I highly recommend them!!!

text: I felt right at home! They make everything feel so comfortable. Extremely warm and welcoming. My constant was amazing. Dr. Clinton has excellent bedside manner and I can’t wait to get my procedures done with him.

name: Dena Burt
text: Very professional and friendly staff... Very caring atmosphere and always available.  Would definitely recommend Reveal Beauty to others.

name: Katherine
text: Dr. Pearce is very personable and has a calm demeanor- which is wonderful if you are trying out a treatment for the first time. He gives his advice but also listens to your input. I highly recommend seeing him at Reveal Beauty. I will be back!

text: I came to see Dr. Clinton for breast augmentation. He was so thorough in explaining to me my options during the consultation. I booked my surgery with ease and the price was very reasonable! text: I would highly recommend this office! Everyone was very welcoming and understanding! They explained everything thoroughly and were very honest!!Cant wait to come back!

I have used both doctors for several treatments and procedures and will return. The staff deserves as much praise as the doctors.

name: Marshella Dimples
text: I got a tummy tuck and liposuction on December 23, 2020. Everyone there is very nice. Dr. Ben Pearce did my surgery, he was upfront about everything and I did exactly what he told me in order to heal properly. I love my results even though it's only been 2 months since my surgery. Just starting to work out again and I'm loving that as well. Thank you Dr. Pearce for a wonderful new beginning for me!🙏👍😃. By the way he has a very pleasant demeanor 🤭

text: I am very happy with my breast augmentation results! Dr. Pearce and his staff did an amazing job from consultation to post-op appointments. He also heard my concerns and answered all questions I had. I am very happy with how they turned out how natural they look!

name: Kayla Carlisle
text: Dr. Pearce and Amanda have been so amazing!!! I had a breast reduction and lift and from the time I scheduled my consult to my surgery and recovery Dr. Pearce and his team have been nothing but amazing. They have always made me feel welcome and comfortable. I am EXTREMELY pleased with the way my breast look! I was so nervous of a botched surgery but that was the furthest thing from what I got.

text: I cannot say enough great things about Reveal Beauty! Dr. Pearce is amazing! I had a tummy tuck done 2 months ago, and I could not be more pleased with my results! text: I loved my time at Reveal Beauty! I have gone to both Dr. Pearce and Dr. Clinton for injectables and cannot recommend them enough. They make the experience comfortable and enjoyable. I love that my results have a natural look - my friends notice a beautiful change but never “too much” work!

text: This experience was such a delight because everyone who assisted Mike Clinton the surgeon were so delightful. Everyone made it so comfortable for me and the time there was so pleasant. I was introduced to all staff and they were such beautiful people.

text: I had a phenomenal experience at Reveal Beauty with Dr Ben Pearce.  I have had fillers with him and recently the baby pixel.  I am loving the results!!  Everyone there is friendly,  informative and made me feel very comfortable and at ease about the procedure!!  They are simply the best!!

name: Lori Deavers
text: Dr. Pearce and the staff are very knowledgeable and personable. The care is comprehensive and everyone makes you feel comfortable during your visits!

name: Caroline Moore
text: I am so impressed by Reveal Beauty.  I had always been reluctant to go into a plastic surgeon’s office, unsure of what to expect. I am in my late 50’s and I didn’t think it was something I would ever do. However, after hearing recommendations from friends I decided to give it a try. I am so glad that I did! From the moment you walk in the door you are greeted with professionalism and friendliness. It is such a serene and easy experience. I went in for a consult with Dr. Clinton and was so impressed. He is a great listener and spent so much time with me. He listened to my concerns and what I wanted to address then offered solutions ranging from surgery to less intrusive options. One of the things I like best about this office is the absence of pressure to do anything that you may not feel comfortable with or ready for. Their office policy is truly reflected in their name “Reveal Beauty”.  The doctors emphasize enhancing your individual beauty, with the objective of achieving a relaxed more youthful look rather than an overdone look. I underwent the C02 laser treatment and the results are amazing! So worth it! In addition to the professionalism and competence of the doctors, the staff is so friendly, kind, patient and helpful. I especially appreciated their follow up after my procedure. They are all so focused on the patient’s wishes and comfort during consult and treatment. I was so impressed that I will be returning for a bleph.

name: Carol Colbert
text: Always courteous and kind.  Dr. Clinton listens intently to your desires and then makes it happen to the best of his ability while exercising his best judgment.  I have always been grateful for his care and look forward to my next procedure!

name: Karin Favret
text: I recently received injectables from Dr. Ben Pearce and I had the most pleasant experience. I am new to injectables and he was patient, gentle, and made my experience so enjoyable. My results are more wonderful than I could’ve imagined. I booked my next appointment right after so I can keep my skin looking so radiant. Thank you Dr. Ben Pearce and Reveal Beauty staff. See y’all soon!

name: Erica Culver
text: I have nothing but great things to say about Dr. Pearce and the Reveal Beauty staff. They are very personable, respectful and patient. I am very pleased with my experience and my results. Highly recommend!!

text: The staff made you feel welcomed and they were friendly. They made you feel special. The Dr. even took the time out to speak to my boyfriend over the phone about my situation.

text: The staff are wonderful and make you feel comfortable every visit.

name: Candy Pruitt
text: Very Professional and wonderful environment. Will go back for facials.

text: I can't say enough about Dr. Pearce and all of his staff! The whole experience succeeded my expectations- his knowledge of what I needed and understanding exactly what I wanted, the extreme friendliness of the staff, etc. This is the only plastic surgery clinic I will ever use or recommend.

text: Great experience, friendly, courteous and responsive team led by Dr. Pearce. Took care of my issue and I'm happy with the results, wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Pearce and the entire team at Reveal.

text: I was lucky enough to meet Dr. Ben Pearce on March 17, 2021 for Botox and my very first ever fillers around my laugh lines and jowls. What a difference I immediately saw with the filler. He put my serious fear at ease about needles and numbed me up really well before he began. I appreciate how he examined my face to determine the best areas to inject and took his time while injecting both the filler and Botox.  I absolutely love the results. I highly recommend Dr. Pearce and will definitely be seeing him in the future for Botox and touch up filler! Wonderful experience!

name: Brandy Erickson
text:
Dr Pearce and the amazing staff at Reveal Beauty made this a no brainer! From beginning to end I have felt comfortable with the decision I made to undergo a tummy tuck. I have had scars across my abdomen from pyloric stenosis & an appendectomy. Unfortunately, I have also had no ability to get a six pack, no matter how hard I worked out nor how thin I was...this was a favorite benefit of the surgery as Dr Pearce fixed my abdominal muscles so they’re United, I have the ability to actually use and feel my abdominal muscles! The care, patience & thoughtfulness I received while under Dr Pearce’s care was unlike any other! I highly recommend anyone interested in having “you’re best You” going forward, check out Revealing Beauty! You will absolutely be impressed with them & your new You!!!!
PS
There are some amazing side effects of this bright new YOU.... you’re going to love your results so much that you’re likely to be dedicating much of your time to fitness, which is going to force you outta the coronavirus depression & into a vibrancy & inner confidence that is an extraordinary bonus!! Hello Healthy, Happy, New You!!! 😍🥰😍

name: Lauren Nathanson
text: Dr. Ben Pearce did a fantastic job in aiding me on my journey of  becoming more comfortable in my own skin with his treatment. He has excellent bedside manner and is genuinely kind. One of my favorite things about Dr. Pearce is his honesty. I went in wanting two treatments, and he was open about me only needing one and not both. He was able to kindly and gently offer suggestions about products or treatment I may need or from which I would benefit the most. I could not have been happier with my choice of doctor.

name: Jack Burnette
text: Dr. Clinton and Dr. Pearce are wonderful to work with and I am very pleased with the procedures I have had done to improve my self image. All of the staff are wonderful to work with as well.

name: Malcolm Bonds
text: I was impressed with Dr. Pearce from the moment I met him. He's very caring and attentive.  He said something at my initial visit with him that really made me decide it was he that I wanted to do my surgery.  He said, "I like doing surgery, but."  The "but," was in reference to the procedure I wanted him to preform, with some doubt if the surgery would achieve what I wanted.  I really appreciated his honesty. So I agreed, regardless of the outcome, because I didn't like looking my  turkey neck. I was more than satisfied.  I was so happy to see my new look.  I think of him everyday when I look in the mirror.  As well as being more than satisfied with his work, I enjoyed his bedside manner.  He was fun to get to know.  I can't say enough good things about his work and his personality.  I am forever grateful.

name: Jenah Connell
text: I am so pleased with my experience! I love Dr. Pearce!! Highly recommend!

name: Lindsey Kurnick
text: I have had the best possible experience with Dr. Pearce. From the moment I made my consultation the service was first class and he made me feel incredibly important. Each time I walked in the door I was greeted by name and seen rather promptly. I had a full tummy tuck, breast lift and Lipo off my lower back. Just as anyone else my end result was really important to me and Dr. Pearce went above and beyond, he didn’t leave me with a narrow straight up and down body that I see so often with TT, he made sure I had a nice hour glass shape, he worked some serious magic with my breasts also, they don’t look like I’ve breast fed 3 kids at all. Dr. Pearce listened and understood my lifestyle and I could not be any happier with my results. I am so glad he is whom I trusted to do my procedure. I truly cannot say enough good things about him as a surgeon. After consulting with several surgeons there is no doubt that Dr. Pearce was the absolute right choice. Thank you so much for giving me my confidence back.

text: I saw Dr. Clinton several times for various non-surgical procedures over a period of years. I went to  another doctor to save money once and came right back to Dr. Clinton. Even though he isn't the cheapest place in town, I felt his expertise was worth the extra cost. However, the last time I was in his office the staff was extremely rude. He instructed me to call anytime with questions about the products I purchased. When I did his assistant refused to come to the phone. She told the receptionist that I needed to schedule an appointment if I had any questions. I made a comment to the receptionist that I could purchase products from another doctor if they weren't willing to support me. She told me not to get defensive. Considering I've spent thousands of dollars with the practice I expected to be treated with more respect. It's unfortunate that I will have to find another doctor with the same good qualities as Dr. Clinton, but I refuse to put up with snobbish office staff.

text: Dr Clinton and his staff have always been so accommodating and compassionate. I always feel relaxed knowing that I'm taken care of when I'm in their hands. I would recommend Dr Clinton to anyone!

text: He is the worse doctor!!! I told him small and gave me a 36 DD.   Had them removed and never checked in me or gave me directions on what to do.   Stay away from him he is a rip off

text: I am being attended by Dr Bilton and Nurse Sexton, Absolutely Amazing! I am getting ready for my last visit before scheduling my surgery and the have been nothing but supportive and positive throughout the process. They are basically saving my life, highly recommend!

name: Stephen Dedman
text: Dr. Matthews was an excellent surgeon and I would highly recommend him. He is very thorough and explained everything in detail. However the office staff including the office manager (Mike) are rude and incompetent. There is a problem with communication. I had to pay an extra fee of $30 to have a third party company fill out medical paperwork to be faxed to my employer and they were not timely in doing so. I had to call repeatedly to make them do their job. After several days of calling and leaving messages I finally got the needed paperwork sent over to my employer. They are very slow to take care of business. When I went back to the office for a follow up visit with Dr Matthews I had to wait over two hours because he was in surgery. The office could have informed me!  This office needs to have better communication with their patients and hire someone to do paperwork. Front receptionist needs to leave her personal phone at home or at least put it aside when there are patients at the window needing help. I hope this review helps others to understand that you will find great surgeons in a not so great office.

name: Joshua Montemayor
text: First & foremost Dr. Matthew's is a good Dr. & I would recommend HIM. He performed a surgery on me a while back and it went smoothly. Fast forward to present day & I'm having some issues with the same exact issue I had surgery on. I thought hey no problem I'll go see Dr. Matthew's again considering he performed my surgery & told me if I ever had any problems in the future with this issue to come see him. I call to make an appointment & they won't even see me! Lady on the phone says I need a "referral". Hello, I'm a patient of his & paid thousands of dollars and now I can't even schedule an appointment with him!? Wow, I guess it really is ALL ABOUT MONEY. Very disappointed, I hope Dr. Matthew's gets a chance to at least read this & see first hand how his patients are being treated. Thanks for caring about my well being, I appreciate your lack of empathy. Treat others how you would want them to treat your mother. Meanwhile I'll be sure to work on a "referral" just not to this Monopoly.

text: Dr. Matthews is one of the best surgeons I have ever gone to. They're a great group of doctors there & I highly recommend them.

text: This office doesn’t even deserve one star. The surgeons may be competent. But their office staff is not. Don’t bother making an appointment you can just walk in and get to see a doctor. This is such a disfunctional office and I recommend going anywhere but here if you can. Otherwise plan to spend the whole day here. Minimum 3 hour wait. text: RUN !!!! Got a phone call less that 24 hours before their procedure that they were both being cancelled because the registering nurse, multiple other nurses that had reviewed their chart, and an anesthesiologist didn't read the chart. My youngest child had already had a procedure here when she was 9 months old where they apparently gave her general anesthesia because the MH risk wasn't documented correctly on her chart.  The put my child at risk the first time , and failed to catch it again until the day before surgery. This facility is a slew of incompetent employees with no regard to patient care or patient safety.

name: MIKAYLA FIGUEROA
text: Dr Hedden and the staff are amazing!! I had a wonderful experience. I drove from Mississippi for his services, was actually recommended by a friend. And I also, recommend a friend and went got a breast augmentation done a couple months after me!! They are the best in the business!! Heather, an out of state coordinator, was so helpful with all my questions. This was the first surgery I have ever had and it went smoothly!! I recovered quick and just had the best experience.

name: Blake Thomas
text: Dr Hedden and his staff are the best in the business! He always takes time to listen to my goals and then explains to me how we can best accomplish my goals. I have always trusted his recommendations and without it my results would not have been satisfactory. Dr Hedden has done a breast augmentation, liposuction, and a tummy tuck on me over the years. Those surgeries boosted my confidence and motivated me to continue improving my body by eating healthier and working out. After I lost about 20lbs, I went back for a breast implant exchange. I’m 3 weeks post op. Never even required a pain pill. I look and feel so much better! Every experience has been flawless. I’ve sent 30+ friends who also love their results. If you are thinking about plastic surgery do it for yourself and go see Dr Hedden!

name: Corissa Lapsley
text: Dr. Hedden and his staff are freaking amazing. I have had the best experience with them since day one. I had a virtual consult and he answered every question and helped me decide what was best. I was able to schedule an appointment so fast. I had my in person consult on 5-14 and he was very attentive, knowledgeable and sweet, couldn’t have asked for a better surgeon. I had surgery for breast augmentation 5-28 and I’m 1 day post op. Surgery was a breeze and pain the same day was a little high which is expected but nothing compared to my c-section. I only took 2 pain pills yesterday. This morning there is some pressure on top but pain is bearable. I love my new breast. All of his staff was nothing but friendly and amazing. I honestly couldn’t have asked for a better surgeon or staff.

name: Kelly Stewart
text: Dr. Hedden and his entire staff are truly awesome!  My experience from the initial consultation to the follow up visits were extremely positive.  Dr. Hedden himself is very professional but very personable as well.  He took time with me answering all my many questions. I could tell he really cares about his patients.  His staff was wonderful as well!

name: Desiree Steiner
text: Had the absolute best experience with Hedden and Gunn. Heather who is the out of town coordinator helped me through the entire process. Traveled from Colorado to have my procedure done. Doctors and nurses were amazing and made me feel very comfortable. I am a week post-op and am able to raise my arms and lift my baby. Obsessed with the results already. Thank You!

name: Magan Quint
text: Very pleased with Dr. Hedden and staff. They make you feel comfortable and informed about all aspects of surgery.  Their customers service exceeded our expectations!!

name: Jessica Guinn
text: I recently used Hedden Plastic Surgery for breast enhancement surgery. My doctor was Dr. Hedden, himself. I specifically chose him for this surgery because he was my surgeon in 2007, when he performed a full abdomenoplasty. I was very happy with the results. I was five years out of gastric bypass at the time & I had lost 110lbs. My weight then was 155. My weight now is 162. So, I have kept the weight off. Dr. Hedden's skills have made me more confident and proportional. He's a great listener and an extremely talented surgeon. I've had zero complications. Dr. Hedden AND his wonderful staff have always EXCEEDED my expectations❤

name: Madisyn Hirsch
text: I have had the BEST experience with Hedden and Gunn plastic surgery! The staff is AMAZING, they have answered all my questions and have made me feel so comfortable and confident that I am making the right decision! I can not wait for my BA!

name: Starla Haney
text: Very pleased with Dr. Hedden and his staff! He does beautiful work and follows up often during the post op process!

name: Kristin Pickett
text: Very professional and experienced! I’m absolutely in love with my new upgrade 😍
