text: The staff was amazing. Dr Doucette is a wonderful surgeon. I am so thankful to have had this life changing procedure. The staff at the Crestwood Hospital was top notch. The entire experience has been great. I live 4.5 hours away and the staff is very supportive and quick to respond.

name: Crystal Miller
text: Dr. Foreman and staff are absolutely wonderful! Easy to deal with and they make the process a whole lot easier with their knowledge.  I would highly recommend Dr. Foreman and his entire office to anyone!

name: Guru Guru
text: The doctor needs to seriously take a look at his "coordinator" and "insurance processor," they are so negative and I am SURE he's losing a lot of business/patients just from the initial call!! I couldn't get off the phone fast enough to call the next available bariatric doctor!! Felt so sorry for the little girl who was trying to schedule my appointment/consultation and was relaying the messages between the insurance person, coordinator and myself, if I didn't know any better, I would of thought they were PISSED OFF at the doctor and didn't want him to have anymore patients, HONESTLY that's HOW BAD IT WAS!!!!!! No to EVERYTHING, no positive energy WHATSOEVER!! Coordinator fee went from $100 to $300 within 45 seconds....👀👀👀👀

name: Barbiewants 2beme
text: TERRIBLY RUDE STAFF! I have to say this is the most unprofessional staff i have ever met. I live over 2.5 hours away and made appointments for procedures on a wed and thurs which me and my husband both had to take off work for because it was the only day that dr. doucett did the procedure and i would need a driver. I paid for a hotel (200) for wed night so we could stay in huntsville for the procedure the next day. I was called by the center that i was suppose to have my procedure done ( 2pm on wed ) at 6am on wed wanting to know where i was. Well i had not been informed that my time had changed. I spoke with the office twice on friday and once on monday before the procedure and was never informed. I called the office at 845 and was spoken to so rudely by christina (christin something like that) . that i have canceled all my future appointments. I am out 1200$( days missed working , hotel fees, and the cost of the labs and everything i had done before this, for this procedure..and that is just this trip) for this office mistakes but was talked to so rudely and disrespectful. I have been in the medical field 25 years and would never speak to a patient like that especially when it was this offices error. I highly recommend looking elsewhere for a surgeon if the staff is this rude to dr foreman patients.  I will be filing a complaint with the state board and following up with a lawyer also.I wish i had of read the reviews before making appointments with this office this seems to be an ongoing problem for this practice

name: Kevin McCullouch
text: Just wanted to say how much I appreciate everyone in the office. Especially Kathy Alnut in the insurance department. I felt like I bugged her to death trying to get everything squared away. She was on top of everything at all times. (Give her a raise) lol....I started my process the end of January I believe and I have my surgery March 25th 2019 with Dr. Foreman and I am so ready. Thanks to the ladies for making everything smooth sailing.

name: Kristine Watts
text: $220 wasted for a 5 minute consult with the Dr who tries to upsale you different procedures. After sitting in the room alone for an 1hr and 45 minutes.

name: Denise Scott
text: Very happy with my experience here everyone is so nice and caring.

name: Diamond In The Sky
text: Most reviews are positive for this practice, this may be the case for the doctors, but every staff member that I spoke with over the phone at Alabama Surgical Associates were very rude, as if I was bothering them.

name: Lauren Abbott
text: I had my consult yesterday and surgery today and everything went great. Dr. Evans, anesthesia, dental assistant, and post op nurses were all wonderful. I was there less than 2 hours for my procedure. Definitely a 5 star facility.

name: Bernyce Wilmot
text: I am extremely nervous when it comes to going to the dentist. My first appointment with Dr Evans was phenomenal, I was at ease and calm. He is very friendly and explains everything that  is going to happen. His nurse Christy is also very friendly and makes you feel like family. I had 3 teeth extracted today and like the first visit I felt comfortable and no anxiety.  In the recovery center the nurse was very attentive and caring. I highly recommend Dr Evans and his staff

name: Shirley Kilpatrick
text: My first visit to this office and it was great everyone was so friendly made you feel right at home like you were apart of the family couldn't ask for nicer people if you need oral surgery done this office is the one you want.

name: Steve Shertzer
text: The doctor and staff did an excellent job and were very friendly. My three tooth extraction went very well - and was painless. Thank you Dr Evans and crew

name: Wendy Silavent
text: My son had seven teeth pulled. The staff was very friendly and helpful. I will tell everyone to go there to get any dental work done.

name: Talia Mills
text:
Dr Evans is one of the best doctors in Alabama.
The kindest most professional man I have ever used. I 💯 trust him with my face and my teeth. He has a wide variety of services he provides in his office.
Dr falconer and Dr Bess are just as wonderful!!! I recommend them 10000xx!
Talia Mills

name: Sherry Glass
text: I seen Dr. Falconer for a consultation and everyone that I encountered was exceptionally nice and concerned in making this experience as pleasant as possible. I have a blood clotting autoimmune disorder and am very nervous about having 6 teeth extracted but they put me at ease. While I'm not looking forward to having it done I appreciate the kindness that the staff shows.

name: Sandra Warren
text:
First, I do not do well at dentist office... but this was for consultation only today, but still apprehensive about what I would hear.  The receptionist was very kind even though she was very busy.  I did not get the two assistances names but they were both very kind and informative !  Dr Evans reviewed my x-rays with me; answering all my many questions, as we talked....VERY knowledgeable, patient and kind!!  Although, I did not schedule today, I will see him soon for my oral surgery. The insurance lady was not able to give me specific total cost because I did not schedule my surgery today, but was very informative and kind enough to give me what it would cost someone with no dental insurance and  advised me to check my policy for specific details.
To Dr. Evans and all his staff  THANK YOU!

name: Alan Rogers
text: Dr. Falconer was very friendly and put every thing in terms that was easily understandable,  When I went to get the teeth removed everyone in the office was very accommodating and friendly, I was taken care of very well after being put out for tooth extractions and then being woke back up and making sure I was coherent to where I was and able to walk to car where my wife was waiting to take me home. I  recommend Southeastern  Oral Surgery to everyone  needing work on your teeth!

name: Tenay Reeves
text: This is a great dental office. The staff is very nice and helpful. The doctor is a kind, nice and down to earth physician. I would definitely recommend your all to anyone who is looking for oral surgeon.

name: Daneisia Davis
text: The staff there is so great. I got three wisdom teeth pulled and was well informed and taken care of all the way to my wife car.  My doctor was Dr.Evan , once I was put under its like I woke up in a chair preparing to get released.  It was mind blowing.  It was a really great experience.  If you need your teeth pulled this is 100% the place to go.  I’m making this post and I literally just got my teeth pulled a hour and a half ago. Everything might be a little woozy that first hour but I did pretty good.  I would recommend any and everyone ! Thanks everyone for your services today !

name: Edwana “Nicki” Thompson
text: I highly recommend Southeastern Oral Maxillofacial to anyone needing any type of oral surgery. They were very pleasant and professional. I was extremely nervous as I have never been sedated before, but they took very good care of me. Dr. Falconer is awesome.

name: Natalie Joiner
text: I was referred to this office by my pharmacy manager. I originally saw Dr Falconer. He was very nice. I did have to move my surgery up due to pain and saw Dr Evans. Everyone up front and in recovery were awesome. I have a special shout out to my nurse and anesthesiologist. I was very nervous and they were very calming and caring. I had 4 teeth removed with 1 of them being a wisdom tooth. I highly recommend this office. They were awesome from start to finish.

name: Linda Garner
text:
My oral surgery was painless and Dr. Evans was wonderful.  Everything was very professional and caring.

Thank you for a great dental experience.

,

name: KevinMcPCFII
text: I was able to get in to see a doctor quickly. Doctor Falconer is friendly and attentive. He spent time explaining the process. He did not try to hurry out of the office. The staff assisting the doctors is great. Everyone is friendly and kind. I’m thankful to have this resolved. I highly recommend Southeastern Oral to anyone needing dental care.

name: Benita Smith
text: I am so thankful for each and everyone that works here! I felt welcomed from the very moment we walked in. I was very nervous, but my nurse and anesthesiologist made me feel comfortable and relaxed! From walking and to leaving out, I was well taken care of! I recommend them to everyone! Thanks for being such an outstanding place...God bless y’all

name: Diane cullinan
text: I had my consultation with Dr. Evans on scheduling my upcoming extraction. He was very thorough and friendly. Also the entire staff was friendly and welcoming.

name: Trudy Wright
text:
I highly recommend Southeastern Oral-Maxillofacial & Cosmetic Surgery Center, P.C. of Dothan, AL. I’ve been fortunate enough to have the Oral and Maxiofillial surgeons of this group care for my oral surgery needs for many, many years and I have yet to have anything but excellent experiences.
Dr. Davis is now retired but while he was practicing he performed oral surgery and placed several implants for me over a period of years. Drs. Davis and Bess, in consultation with my dentist Dr. Dollar, also surgically moved my jaw forward correcting my bite and very successfully relieved the jaw pain and headaches the misalignment had caused.
In the last several years Dr. Falconer has placed five implants for me and I have found him to be as personable, kind and caring a professional as was Dr. Davis.
I also want to commend the excellent staff who keep this very busy office running so smoothly. Each of them is pleasant and eager to assist the patients and their family whether in person or by telephone.
Last but certainly not least, I cannot say enough positive things about Ms. Shelley, the implant co-ordinator for this practice. Over the the last few years Ms. Shelley has worked with me tirelessly, helping me with scheduling, sometimes rescheduling appointments, solving co-ordination and communication problems with a “former, less than cooperative” dentist’s office I switched to when we moved away from the area, and keeping me knowledgable enough to make intelligent financial decisions about lost teeth. This young woman is very kind and caring, always pleasant and helpful and such a nice person!
We drive two hours each way to be able to use this surgery group and I consider it worth every mile we travel which should tell you how highly I recommend them.

name: Tara Waddell
text: You couldn't tell my daughter had two teeth surgically removed if you hadn't known. They did a fantastic job! & there really wasn't no swelling, and she hasn't really complained about pain. I don't know what their secret is, but my 6 year old had an amazing experience & I couldn't be more enthused with the outcome.

name: Charmayne Sanders
text: They made me feel very comfortable and talked to me and not at me

name: AMANDA CAUSEY
text: Let me say the hospitality in this place is not but amazing. From the front door to the back. Shout out to Ms Sherry she's awesome!!! I went to have a tooth removed and I felt at home.❤️

name: Rick J
text: I’ve had two implants done here and both times I felt the entire staff did a wonderful job. Very friendly and very helpful; made me feel as though I was the most important patient. Highly recommend and if I ever need another implant I know exactly where to go. I thank you all.

name: Mike Tidbit
text: They work miracles there! Great experience.

name: Nighta

name: Paula Givens

The clinical staff made me feel comfortable and welcome. If I ever need treatment in the future, I will definitely visit SOS again!

resp.text: Ultimate, we would love an opportunity to discuss this situation but would need more information. If you are approved on your girl friend’s HIPAA, please give us a call if you would like to talk further. Cindy Austin, Administrator 334-792-2880. Otherwise, she can call us. Thank you.

text: Staff is very professional and polite. The wait time is very short. Proper social distancing in regards to waiting area. They get you in get you fixed up and get you out. They actually got me over my fear of dentist!!! Would definitely recommend over and over again!!!

name: Amy Piggott
text: My daughter who is eleven had a wisdom tooth removed this morning. Although she was both nervous and afraid, the staff was warm and friendly which comforted her and, in turn, also comforted me. Thanks to all of the staff who made this frightful experience more pleasant and positive.

name: Cheryl Kelly
text: Even during these trying and difficult times of the pandemic ,everyone I met here was polite and professional. Friendly and caring staff .

name: Leslie Pelham
text: These guys did a fabulous job of making me comfortable, answering my questions, and fixing my problem. They were polite, knowledgeable, and very professional. I would recommend them to anyone needing or wanting quality oral care. Thanks guys.

text: All points of contacts here were friendly and courteous. Nice office area that was clean. But our check-in lady was a Gator fan (barf). Y’all gone have to fix that. #GoNoles

text: I had all 4 wisdom teeth removed. Frankly, I was quite scared but the staff was very friendly and assured me that they would take good care of me. Post surgery has gone pretty well so far. Thanks to dr falconer and staff for doing a great job

text: My visit today was great.  The staff was very nice, helpful and made me feel welcome. Dr. Falconer was thorough in explaining the procedure for removing my broken tooth.  I would definitely recommend this practice!!!

text: My first visit was Thursday to have 4 teeth surgically removed. I was nervous but Dr. Falconer was so nice and informative on what was going to be done, answered all my questions, and helped ease my nerves. His staff was friendly and knowledgeable. Highly recommened them!!

text: Very high quality professional service with the friendliest staff around. I hate any dentist and they set me at ease before, during and after my procedure. Highly recommend them.

text: The staff there is very friendly no complaints here. I would definitely recommend this place to everyone I know hands down. Thank you thank you thank you! 😁

name: Niga Thomas
text: My appointment was at 11:15 am, I got there at 11:00 am . I didn’t get called back until 1:30 p.m. They apologized nonchalantly. I was very upset about the long wait time... I was there for Wisdom Teeth removal, So my husband had to drive me and stay during the procedure until it was over to drive us home. We had to get a babysitter for our three kids, so we could attend this appointment. The two hour wait time resulted an extra 100 dollars to our babysitter. If this staff would have told us about the longer wait time or the actual time I would have been seen . There would have been no issues. The Dr and Staff was wonderful and thorough. Just wished their time management was better . If I would have showed up 2 hrs late I bet the appointment would have been canceled.The only reason I am giving this service a 2 star is because at least the staff was nice. I hope this helps for future patients!

name: Ashley Mckeel
text: Had a tooth extraction and the experience couldn't of went any better. I literally didn't have an ounce of pain. The doctors & staff are amazing.

name: Paula Anderson-ard
text: I absolutely love this place!! The entire staff was so friendly and helpful in every way. I would highly recommend this location to anyone who needs to see an oral surgeon. I didn't even have a long wait time to be seen!

name: Katelynn Smith
text:
Editing to say that the office administrator contacted me to apologize and correct this error:
They got me in, did the surgery, and I was on my way. The reason I am giving such a low star rating is they failed to tell me that if I waited 15 days my dental insurance would cover it. They told me initially they accepted my insurance but not one person in the office felt it right to inform me that if I waited 2 weeks I wouldn't have to pay $1500 out of pocket.
So thanks

resp.text: Tena, Please contact our office to further discuss your experience as we are unable to locate any interaction between you and our office.  We would love the opportunity to correct any misunderstanding. You may ask for our Front Desk Supervisor.  Thank you.

text: Awesome service...

name: Mel T
text: Wonderful!

name: Mary Humphrey
text: I loved it!!!!

name: Jeff Franklin
text:
Absolutely the worst patient processing timing ever.
Took mother due to awful pain in back. 2 1/2 hour wait to see doctor Heck. We got there 15 minutes before the scheduled time to be there. I am sure if we missed it they would want to charge for missing schedule. I am totally fed up with doctors that over schedule and then want to charge you if you are late. Not sure if I would go back if doctor recommended him. “Heck” I am not sure if he will show up!

Inexcusable for that type of waiting, especially when it is a back doctor.

name: Andrea F.
text:
Dr Heck saved my life.  Went to the ER at another hospital before seeing him and they thought I was trying to get drugs since I was complaining about back pain.  Dr heck took me seriously and did surgery even though my MRI wasn’t that bad.  Found out during surgery that I had a rare condition with abnormal nerves in my back. He said he sees this condition about every 2 years. The abnormal nerves were causing the pain - I felt like I was being electrocuted.
He also later performed a back surgery on my mother. Her back is much better now.  We were worried about her surviving the surgery due to her health.  She had a rough recovery - but overall her back is much better.  Highly recommend Heck.

resp.text: Amazing story, Andrea! Thank you so much for sharing it with us, and we're thrilled to hear about you and your family's outcomes. We'll make sure your praise is known to Dr. Heck and the whole team.

name: Janice Woodard
text:
Dr. Heck was very nice n very knowledgeable about my concerns. We are going to try an option that has not ever been brought to my attention. I hope n pray it works.
Dr. Heck did give me some Hope for my back problems.

resp.text: Hi, Janice. Thank you for the wonderful review! We're glad you had a great experience.

name: Delinda Morris
text: I was very pleased with my first visit with Dr.Heck and staff.  All were very caring and professional. Dr. Heck answered all my questions and made me feel at ease.Thank you all so much!

name: Kristy Griffie
text: My experience at Southlake has been nothing but pleasant. Dr. Heck is awesome. He explains everything to you where you can understand. The staff is nice also.

name: Melissa Gilley
text: He is a very caring doctor, that tells you all the goods and bads of surgery. It lays it all out there for you and that I really appreciate that honesty. It doesn’t take long to get an appointment with Dr. Heck and the staff is fantastic. And you don’t have to sit and wait to see the doctor for appointment.

name: Tim Carter
text: I had a good experience at this office during the pandemic.  Checkin was quick and easy on a electronic kiosk that read my drivers license, insurance card, and credit card copay.The reception was nearby to answer questions and the seating area was set up for social distancing.  Everyone wore masks.  It was a short wait to be examined.  Xrays were done in the office.  I had a good experience.

name: Deanie Penney
text: Overall favorable However I called yesterday afternoon and got Heather’s voicemail. She is the one I need to talk to but I didn’t hear from her yesterday afternoon so need to talk to her Monday for sure!

name: Team Grind 2023
text: Went to Dr. Hecks for a second opinion for the issues and pain associated with my neck. He took time to explain why I was having the pain and also my options to fix my issue, he never acted like he was in a hurry. The staff was also very friendly and attentive plus I didn’t have to wait long. Overall is was a very good experience.

name: Linda Lowery
text: I would advice doing all paperwork online before you arrive by doing so I was called back right after I Signed in. The nurse was very sweet asked a few questions and told me that Dr.Heck would be right in which he was. He was very nice and to the point as to what he needed to get my treatment started waiting on a test to be scheduled. And he will call me with the results.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback.

text: Great staff, great nurses, and a great Doctor. I have had nothing but good experiences everytime I have gone. Including my surgery. Every one is so nice and goes above and beyond to help you. I could not ask for sweeter, kind-hearted, helpful people. I'm just sorry it took me a while to find them. But at least I have them now. I recommend them to anyone needing them...

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback.  Our goal is to provide great patient care!

name: Rose Foster
text: I was taken very good care of by the staff. Dr. Heck took time out to listen and explain my options.  Plus I was in and out in a timely manner.

text: Dr Heck did a fusion of the L5 and S1. After I woke up, all the pain in my leg and hip was gone. He listen to everything I said and ask and answered every question. His office staff and PA Laura is also GREAT!  Glad God sent him to me. Great experience!

name: Judy Young
text: Dr.Heck and his staff was very professional making a severe back problem not as scary as it could have been. Looking forward to the next visit.

name: Brent Curtin
text: If you are in need of back surgery, do not hesitate to use Dr Heck. Dr.Heck and his team makes you feel comfortable and they don’t stop working until you are back in good health. I appreciate everyone at Southlake including Dr Craig. I highly recommend Southlake.

name: Lee Anderson
text: Had an appointment with Southlake's back surgeon, Dr. Heck, after surgery. Everything progressing on time and feeling better every day. Thanks Dr. Heck!!

name: Michael Schleinkofer
text: Horrible doctor.  Couldn’t diagnose my pinched spinal cord even though the MRI stated it clearly.

name: demetra sarris
text: Wonderful staff.  Dr. Heck listened to my problems.  Very satisfied with procedure he ordered, etc.  Would highly recommend him.

name: Ellen Wohlgemuth
text: Dr Heck was very helpful in explaining the problem I have and the necessary procedure to alleviate the problem. I highly recommend him. His staff was very professional and kind

name: JoAnne Bernard
text: This man is AMAZING !!! He is truly a gift from God !!! He saved me and brought me back to my family !!! No more pain and completely drug free for the first time in 10 years !!!

name: Sheila Sealy
text: Dr. Heck is an exceptional doctor.  I would trust him with any of my needs or my family's needs.

name: Tasha Ambers
text: Dr. Christopher Heck is absolutely the WORST  orthopedic surgeon in Alabama!  Due to his incompetence, a simple disc herniation has resulted in me being disabled. What should have been a three week recovery has now been more than three years with no recovery!  He performed a second surgery and now I need a third.  After two years, and I decided to let God handle him and not sue him, he got very rude with me and told me he did not want to see me anymore and less I want another surgery. After countless procedures and  thousands of dollars in physical therapy, (22 weeks all together) I will now live with his incompetent error!  He definitely lives up to his name! He’s not worth a HECK!!!!

name: Leigh Pearson
text: Dr. Christopher Heck is so amazing!  He has performed a discectomy for my sister (herniated disc with a conjoined nerve root that he found during surgery, that was causing more pain than just a herniated disc would cause).  She is doing fantastic!  He also performed a fusion from L3/L4 to L5/S1 for my mother who suffers from severe spinal stenosis.  She went from a wheelchair to a walker, and the walker is only because she has neuropathy in both feet!  I cannot say enough about how wonderful this man is!  And he’s not only a smart and talented surgeon, but he’s kind and takes the time to listen to his patients (and their caregivers)!

resp.text: I appreciate the feedback you provided!

name: Angela Thornburg
text:
Dr. Heck is "The DOCTOR" to go see. He is personable, doesn't forget what is going on with you. He explains all procedures in detail with words and explanations that you understand.
With having 3 back surgeries before i was referred by Dr. Lawler from Oxford Alabama. My back kept becoming worse and the pain got to the point I couldnt take it anymore after hurting for about 6 years. Dr. Heck told me that he could help me but i had to have a long and extensive back surgery that was about 5 to 6 hours long. I was ready for anything and I left his office that day confident he would help me.
Dr. Heck came out 3 times during the surgery to speak to my husband to let him know how I was doing, and where he was in the surgery. That meant so much to my husband and me that he had that much consideration not to leave my husband wondering what was going on.
I came out of surgery that day PAINFREE, after 6 years of constant hurting.  I was Up walking around the hospital floor on the second day feeling like wonder woman, I went home on the 3rd day. I can also walk straight and stand straight. That was a bonus that I didn't know that could be fixed.
Everyone from the nurse care in recovery, the nurses there on the floor that took the most gentle and sweet care of me. The sweet people that brought your food, the folks that came to your room to get your food order, to the sweet sweet girls that cleaned my room were a joy to be around. GREAT HOSPITAL!!
Both of Dr Heck's office staff are great and attentive.  They Call You Right Back, friendly, and they get you right in to see him.
I can't say enough great things about Dr. Heck and his staff.  Go see him and get your hurting fixed by a Great Doctor!!! All I can say is Thank God for Dr. Heck because I can't say enough of good about him.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review.

name: Sherrie Dawson
text: Was very fast at the time didn't have to wait long and the staff was great.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback!

Then he explained the options available to me and the pros and cons of each and then his recommendation. Well worth the drive to BHM from MGM.

Dr heck was excellent
